column1: '''''Lembas'' (Vol. 2, No. 10)''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Lembas (journal)
column2: Lembas]]'', published by [[Unquendor]]. The issue includes [[Renée Vink]]'s article "Tolkien in Rotterdam", about Tolkien's visit to Rotterdam in 1958. The article reproduces a photograph of Tolkien taken at the occasion, and includes a number of quotations from letters by Tolkien (among them, [[Letter to Cees Ouboter]]).<ref>{{webcite

column1: <!-- [Hmm, the following info from TolkienBooks.net contradicts Scull and Hammond's Chronology. Will leave it out for now (User:Morgan).]

column2: a letter to Cees Ouboter, dated 18 March 1958]] (p. 20).

column1: #Quote from a letter to [[Letter to Cees Ouboter
#Reproduction of part of a letter to ?Cees Ouboter, dated uncertain but before 27 March 1958, regarding Tolkien’s visit to Rotterdam (p. 21).

#Reproduction of a part of a letter to Cees Ouboter, date uncertain but possibly 2 April 1958, expressing thanks to Voorhoeve en Dietrich for their kindness and promotion of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (p. 22).
